No bikes permitted on Sunday W/B NYC arrivals between 4:30 PM-7:30 PM. See http://bit.ly/1biGIhu for other restrictions.

Permits are required to bring bikes on LIRR trains. Specific restrictions apply for bikes on Montauk Br. trains in the summer. No bikes allowed on Friday E/B departures from NYC between 1-8PM. Bike Restrictions for Summer Montauk Branch Trains

Permits are required to bring bikes on LIRR trains. Specific restrictions apply for bikes on Montauk Br. trains in the summer. No bikes allowed on Friday E/B departures from NYC between 1-8PM. No bikes permitted on Sunday W/B NYC arrivals between 4:30 PM-7:30 PM. See http://bit.ly/1biGIhu for other restrictions.
LIRR Service for The New York Pops Concert at Forest Hills Stadium Today

The LIRR is adding extra stops at Forest Hills Station for those attending The New York Pops Concert with Pink Martini at Forest Hills Stadium today. See http://bit.ly/1M1VlHH. To exit the train at Forest Hills, you MUST be in one of the first four cars. Take your LIRR ticket with you when exiting the train; it will be collected at Forest Hills Station.

Bicycle permits are required to bring bikes onboard LIRR trains, with the exception of folding bikes. Bike permits can be purchased for $5 at LIRR station ticket windows or onboard trains. See http://bit.ly/1biGIhu for details on bike restrictions.

Bike Restrictions for Summer Montauk Branch Trains

Permits are required to bring bikes on LIRR trains. Specific restrictions apply for bikes on Montauk Br. trains in the summer. No bikes allowed on Friday E/B departures from NYC between 1-8PM. No bikes permitted on Sunday W/B NYC arrivals between 4:30 PM-7:30 PM. See http://bit.ly/1biGIhu for other restrictions.

Bicycle permits are required to bring bikes onboard LIRR trains, with the exception of folding bikes. Bike permits can be purchased for $5 at LIRR station ticket windows or onboard trains. See http://bit.ly/1biGIhu for details on bike restrictions.

New Canaan Branch Weekend Busing Fri., July 31 - Sun., August 23

Substitute bus service will be provided between New Canaan and Stamford stations for select trains on Fridays, beginning July 31, and for all trains on Saturdays and Sundays through August 23 to accommodate grade crossing renewal work and the Connecticut Department of Transportation's Merritt Parkway Bridge reconstruction. See details and schedule at http://bit.ly/1ebO88P. We appreciate your patience during this service change.
